actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study on the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Thomas Nast Home in New Jersey as a unit of the National Park System.
short_title: Thomas Nast Home National Historic Park Study Act of 1992

summary.text: Thomas Nast Home National Historic Park Study Act of 1992 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to specified congressional committees on the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Thomas Nast Home (known as the Villa Fontana) in Morristown, New Jersey, as a unit of the National Park System. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Thomas Nast Home National Historic Park Study Act of 1992
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study on the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Thomas Nast Home in New Jersey as a unit of the National Park System.
